price: 3 Place ta confiance en Allah qui est un protecteur amplement suffisant.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
